org.miniauth.oauth.credential.mapper

Interface OAuthCredentialMapper

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CredentialMapper
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DynamicGAEConsumerCredentialMapper, DynamicGAECredentialMapper, DynamicGAETokenCredentialMapper, DynamicOAuthConsumerCredentialMapper, DynamicOAuthCredentialMapper, DynamicOAuthTokenCredentialMapper, GAEConsumerCredentialMapper, GAECredentialMapper, GAETokenCredentialMapper, OAuthConsumerCredentialMapper, OAuthTokenCredentialMapper
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractOAuthCredentialMapper, OAuthGAEConsumerCredentialMapper, OAuthGAECredentialMapper, OAuthGAETokenCredentialMapper, OAuthLocalConsumerCredentialMapper, OAuthLocalCredentialMapper, OAuthLocalTokenCredentialMapper

    public interface OAuthCredentialMapper
extends CredentialMapper
    Defines an OAuth-specific "credential mapper".
